history.proof: intros n. induction n. - apply Oo. - apply So. apply IHn.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n : nat, Ord (Nat n)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive Ord : Ens -> Prop := Oo : Ord Vide | So : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Succ E) | Lo : forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> Ord (Union E) | Eo : forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> EQ E E' -> Ord E' Arguments Lo _ _%function_scope
Nat = fun H : nat => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => Ens) Vide (fun (_ : nat) (X : Ens) => Succ X) H : nat -> Ens Arguments Nat _%nat_scope
Inductive Ord : Ens -> Prop := Oo : Ord Vide | So : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Succ E) | Lo : forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> Ord (Union E) | Eo : forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> EQ E E' -> Ord E' Arguments Lo _ _%function_scope
So : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Succ E)
Eo : forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> EQ E E' -> Ord E'
Lo : forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> Ord (Union E)
Ord_ind : forall P : Ens -> Prop, P Vide -> (forall E : Ens, Ord E -> P E -> P (Succ E)) -> (forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> P e) -> P (Union E)) -> (forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> P E -> EQ E E' -> P E') -> forall e : Ens, Ord e -> P e
Ord_sind : forall P : Ens -> SProp, P Vide -> (forall E : Ens, Ord E -> P E -> P (Succ E)) -> (forall E : Ens, (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> Ord e) -> (forall e : Ens, IN e E -> P e) -> P (Union E)) -> (forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> P E -> EQ E E' -> P E') -> forall e : Ens, Ord e -> P e
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.sqrt_specif : forall n : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.sqrt n * PeanoNat.Nat.sqrt n <= n < S (PeanoNat.Nat.sqrt n) * S (PeanoNat.Nat.sqrt n)
PeanoNat.Nat.lxor_spec : forall a b n : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.lxor a b) n = xorb (PeanoNat.Nat.testbit a n) (PeanoNat.Nat.testbit b n)
PeanoNat.Nat.pred_succ : forall n : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.pred (S n) = n
Nnat.Nat2N.id : forall n : nat, BinNat.N.to_nat (BinNat.N.of_nat n) = n
Pnat.SuccNat2Pos.id_succ : forall n : nat, BinPos.Pos.to_nat (BinPos.Pos.of_succ_nat n) = S n
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
PeanoNat.Nat.succ_pred : forall n : nat, n <> 0 -> S (PeanoNat.Nat.pred n) = n
PeanoNat.Nat.ls_ls' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, n < z -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n
PeanoNat.Nat.ones_spec_low : forall n m : nat, m < n -> PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.ones n) m = true
PeanoNat.Nat.ones_spec_high : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.ones n) m = false
PeanoNat.Nat.ones_spec_iff : forall n m : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.ones n) m = true < -> m < n
Nnat.Nat2N.inj_add : forall n n' : nat, BinNat.N.of_nat (n + n') = BinNat.N.add (BinNat.N.of_nat n) (BinNat.N.of_nat n')
PeanoNat.Nat.log2_spec : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> PeanoNat.Nat.pow 2 (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 n) <= n < PeanoNat.Nat.pow 2 (S (PeanoNat.Nat.log2 n))
PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit_eqb : forall a n m : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit a n) m = (PeanoNat.Nat.testbit a m && negb (PeanoNat.Nat.eqb n m))%bool
PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit_iff : forall a n m : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.testbit (PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit a n) m = true < -> PeanoNat.Nat.testbit a m = true /\ n <> m
PeanoNat.Nat.mul_mod : forall a b n : nat, n <> 0 -> PeanoNat.Nat.modulo (a * b) n = PeanoNat.Nat.modulo (PeanoNat.Nat.modulo a n * PeanoNat.Nat.modulo b n) n
List.repeat_spec : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (x y : A), List.In y (List.repeat x n) -> y = x
PeanoNat.Nat.div2_bitwise : forall (op : bool -> bool -> bool) (n a b : nat), PeanoNat.Nat.div2 (PeanoNat.Nat.bitwise op (S n) a b) = PeanoNat.Nat.bitwise op n (PeanoNat.Nat.div2 a) (PeanoNat.Nat.div2 b)
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.odd_bitwise : forall (op : bool -> bool -> bool) (n a b : nat), PeanoNat.Nat.odd (PeanoNat.Nat.bitwise op (S n) a b) = op (PeanoNat.Nat.odd a) (PeanoNat.Nat.odd b)
Ring_theory.rpow_pow_N : forall (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R), Ring_theory.power_theory rI rmul req Cp_phi rpow -> forall (r : R) (n : BinNums.N), req (rpow r (Cp_phi n)) (Ring_theory.pow_N rI rmul r n)
PeanoNat.Nat.ones = fun n : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.pred (PeanoNat.Nat.shiftl 1 n) : nat -> nat Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.ones _%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit = fun a n : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.ldiff a (PeanoNat.Nat.shiftl 1 n) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.clearbit (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Record power_theory (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) : Prop := mkpow_th { rpow_pow_N : forall (r : R) (n : BinNums.N), req (rpow r (Cp_phi n)) (Ring_theory.pow_N rI rmul r n) } Arguments Ring_theory.power_theory [R]%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope [Cpow]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mkpow_th [R]%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope [Cpow]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.divide_refl : forall n : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.divide n n
PeanoNat.Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
PeanoNat.Nat.le_0_l : forall n : nat, 0 <= n
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_succ_diag_r : forall n : nat, n < S n
PeanoNat.Nat.le_pred_l : forall n : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.pred n <= n
PeanoNat.Nat.add_0_r : forall n : nat, n + 0 = n
PeanoNat.Nat.sub_0_r : forall n : nat, n - 0 = n
PeanoNat.Nat.add_0_l : forall n : nat, 0 + n = n

```  
intros n.
induction n.
- apply Oo.
- apply So.
  exact IHn.
```
